name: Soul Burn
text: Spend only black and/or red mana on X.\nSoul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

name: Balduvian Horde
text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

name: Death Spark
text: Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

text: Trample\nGoblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
